meanings.definition: Words or symbols written or engraved on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The ancient inscriptions on the stone told stories of brave warriors.
meanings.sent2: The inscriptions on the monument were difficult to decipher due to their age.
meanings.sent3: The inscriptions on the classroom board were so messy that the teacher couldn't read them.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an inscription of joy on his heart, forever etched in his memory.
meanings.sent5: The inscriptions on the old tree trunk seemed to whisper secrets of the forest.

meanings.definition: The act of writing or engraving words or symbols on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The careful inscriptions on the wedding invitations added a personal touch.
meanings.sent2: His inscriptions on the sand were quickly washed away by the waves.
meanings.sent3: The inscriptions on the cake were so beautiful that no one wanted to cut it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an inscription on her face, visible to all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The inscriptions on the cave walls seemed to glow in the dim light, revealing ancient secrets.
